text: Tangerang is a city in Banten, Indonesia. It is located 25 km west of Jakarta. It is the sixth largest city in the nation. It has an area of 164.54 kmÂ² and an population of 1,797,715 (2010), increasing to 2,001,925 as at 2014http://www.depkes.go.id/downloads/Penduduk%20Kab%20Kota%20Umur%20Tunggal%202014.pdf Estimasi Penduduk Menurut Umur Tunggal Dan Jenis Kelamin 2014 Kementerian Kesehatan It is the eighth most populated suburb in the world. The Soekarno- Hatta International Airport which serves Greater Jakarta is in the city. In 2021, 49 people were killed in a prison fire. ==References== Category:Banten Category:Cities in Indonesia
title: Tangerang
